message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $9500. It's a unique opportunity to get a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see that you're a serious buyer, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $9000. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $8200? I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I can only go up to $9250. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $8500. I really want to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
